row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 5)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 10)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 16)
row_desc: Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
